php.LBL_2FA_TOTP_DESC:
In order to generate single use codes you need the appropriate application.
It can be used on a computer or on a phone.
php.LBL_2FA_SECRET_ALREADY_SET: Private key (TOTP) has been already generated, in order to change it, activate a new key.
php.LBL_NEW_PASSWORD_CRITERIA: The new password must meet the following criteria:
php.LBL_RESET_PASSWORD_LINK_SENT: The link for password change is waiting to be sent, it can take a few minutes. Please check your inbox. The token is valid until %s
php.LBL_RESET_PASSWORD_SMTP_ERROR: Problem sending the password reset e-mail, please contact the administrator.
